Journal.Title: Zhong yao cai = Zhongyaocai = Journal of Chinese medicinal materials

Article.ArticleTitle: [Establishment of plantlet regeneration system of medicinal plant Aconitum coreanum].

AbstractText: To set up the rapid propagation and plantlet regeneration system of medicinal plant Aconitum coreanum (Levi.) Rpaics.
Adventitious buds and regenerated plantlet were obtained by shoot tip culture through different media and combination of plant growth regulators.

MS medium was the optimal medium for differentiation and proliferation of shoot tip. MS medium with 6-BA 2 to approximately 5 mg/L was found to be most suitable for the induction of bud. MS with 6-BA 2 mg/L + GA3 1 to approximately 5 mg/L or adenine 1 to approximately 5 mg/L was best combination for the growth and proliferation of adventitious buds, and MS with IBA 0.5 to approximately 1 mg/L for the induction of root.
Tip culture may be used as a useful method to get regenerated plantlet of Aconitum coreanum under certain conditions.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: College of Biological and Environmental Sciences, Jiangsu University, Zhenjiang.
